name: iOS-Check-Permission
summary: Permits the user request for permission access the iOS (Calendar , Reminder, Gallery and Location)
description: **iOS Check Permissions** Offer a set of methods to solicit the use of operating system resources (iOS), through the permissions to authorize the use of resources such as: - Camera - Gallery - Reminder - Location See more on Youtube video: - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JxdlaEp6dC0
